languages.text: "Во имя Золотого Трона!" {n}Арджента в оцепенении рассматривает порубленные тела местных жителей — юношей, дев, стариков и детей.{/n} "Чем провинились эти несчастные, раз их постигла такая участь?"

traits.locale_text: "Во имя Золотого Трона!" {n}Арджента в оцепенении рассматривает порубленные тела местных жителей — юношей, дев, стариков и детей.{/n} "Чем провинились эти несчастные, раз их постигла такая участь?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
languages.original_text: "Во имя Золотого Трона!" {n}Арджента в оцепенении рассматривает порубленные тела местных жителей — юношей, дев, стариков и детей.{/n} "Чем провинились эти несчастные, раз их постигла такая участь?"

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the chopped-up bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did those poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the chopped-up bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did those poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the chopped-up bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did those poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the chopped-up bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did those poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Por el Trono Dorado!». {n}Argenta contempla anonadada los cadáveres despedazados de los aldeanos; hombres y mujeres, jóvenes y ancianos.{/n} «¿Qué ofensa han podido cometer estos infelices para merecer tan macabro destino?».
languages.original_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el Trono Dorado!». {n}Argenta contempla anonadada los cadáveres troceados de los aldeanos; hombres y mujeres, jóvenes y ancianos.{/n} «¿Qué ofensa han podido cometer estos infelices para merecer tan macabro destino?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “黄金王座在上啊！”{n}阿洁塔震惊地看着惨遭屠杀的村民，男男女女，老老少少。{/n}“这些可怜的灵魂究竟犯了什么罪过，要遭受如此可怕的命运？”
languages.original_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上啊！”{n}阿洁塔震惊地看着当地村民被肢解的尸体，男男女女，老老少少。{/n}“这些可怜的灵魂究竟犯了什么罪过，要遭受如此可怕的命运？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Par le Trône d'Or ! » {n}Abasourdie, Argenta regarde les cadavres massacrés des villageois : hommes et femmes, jeunes et vieux.{/n} « Qu'ont fait ces pauvres âmes pour mériter un sort aussi terrible ? »
languages.original_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"

traits.locale_text: « Au nom du Trône d'Or ! » {n}Abasourdie, Argenta regarde les cadavres massacrés des villageois : hommes et femmes, jeunes et vieux.{/n} « Qu'ont fait ces pauvres âmes pour mériter un sort aussi terrible ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座の名において！」{n}アルジェンタは朦朧とした意識の中で、切り刻まれた村人たちの死体を見ていた …そこに、老若男女の区別はなかった。{/n}「このような陰惨な運命を辿らねばならぬほどに、この哀れな魂は罪を犯したというのか？」
languages.original_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"

traits.locale_text: 「黄金の玉座の名において！」{n}アルジェンタは朦朧とした意識の中で、切り刻まれた村人たちの死体を見ていた …そこに、老若男女の区別はなかった。{/n}「このような陰惨な運命を辿らねばならぬほどに、この哀れな魂は罪を犯したというのか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Beim Goldenen Thron!" {n}Benommen blickt Argenta auf die zerstückelten Leichen der Dorfbewohner ... Männer und Frauen, jung und alt.{/n} "Welches Verbrechen haben diese armen Seelen begangen, um ein solch grausames Schicksal zu verdienen?"
languages.original_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen des Goldenen Throns!" {n}Benommen blickt Argenta auf die zerstückelten Leichen der Dorfbewohner ... Männer und Frauen, jung und alt.{/n} "Welches Verbrechen haben diese armen Seelen begangen, um ein solch grausames Schicksal zu verdienen?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Altın Taht adına!" {n}Argenta, kasabanın yerli halkının kesilip biçilmiş bedenlerine şaşkınlık içinde bakıyor. Erkekler ve kadınlar, gençler ve yaşlılar...{/n} "Bu zavallı insanlar, ne tür bir kabahatte bulundular da böylesine dehşet dolu bir kaderi hak ettiler?"
languages.original_text: "By the Golden Throne!" {n}In a daze, Argenta looks at the butchered bodies of the local villagers — men and women, young and old.{/n} "What offence did these poor souls commit to deserve such a gruesome fate?"
